meanings.definition: Two words derived from the same original word.
meanings.sent1: In linguistics, doublets are fascinating to study.
meanings.sent2: The English language has many interesting doublets.
meanings.sent3: The teacher explained doublets by using 'help' and 'aid' as an example.
meanings.sent4: The concept of doublets is like seeing twins in language.
meanings.sent5: Learning about doublets can help expand your vocabulary.

meanings.definition: A pair of matching items, such as shoes or gloves.
meanings.sent1: She bought a lovely pair of doublets for her dance performance.
meanings.sent2: The store sells doublets in various colors and sizes.
meanings.sent3: His collection of doublets included matching belts and hats.
meanings.sent4: The doublets she wore were perfectly coordinated with her outfit.
meanings.sent5: Matching doublets can make an outfit look stylish and put together.

meanings.definition: A set of two similar or identical things.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious doublets of desserts for the party.
meanings.sent2: The gift box contained a doublets of scented candles.
meanings.sent3: The twins wore doublets of costumes to the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The doublets of flowers in the garden added a beautiful touch.
meanings.sent5: Having a doublets of options can make decision-making easier.
